title.en: Still Fun Guest Shift | Edition No. 1
title.zh: 贵州遵义MEDUSA调酒师徐明祥做客成都萃坊

description.en:
South‑west China's leading tech‑minded mixologist is dropping into Chengdu for a single night behind the Still Fun Yulin bar. Xu approaches cocktails with lab‑grade precision—distillation, fat‑washing and low‑temperature sous‑vide—condensing Guizhou's untamed mountain flavours into what he calls a 'tipsy galaxy'.  
Word is he's also bringing a dark cocktail: intimidating in appearance, unexpectedly sublime on the palate…
description.zh: 🍸萃坊「串门」特邀客座首期开张！ 来自遵义 Medusa 水母酒吧的主理人徐明祥本周三闪现成都，接管萃坊玉林店吧台！ 这位西南调酒界技术流，以实验室级手法玩转蒸馏/油洗/低温慢煮，将贵州山野风味化作微醺星河，据说还有暗黑彩蛋特调惊喜……

title.en: Guest Shift | Simone Caporale × Liao Jien Ming
title.zh: 鸡尾酒客座 | Sips联合创始人Simone Caporale与庙前集团总经理廖建鸣

description.en:
Renaissance artistry meets East‑Asian ingenuity, distilled into a single glass.

For one exclusive evening at Jing Bar, Simone Caporale — co‑founder of Barcelona's acclaimed Sips — joins forces with Liao Jien Ming, General Manager of Hope and Seasame Group, to craft a limited‑edition menu you'll experience only tonight.
description.zh:
🍸 Simone Caporale x LIAO JIEN MING 廖建鸣 联袂呈现
将文艺复兴美学与东方创意注入杯中
西班牙知名酒吧Sips联合创始人Simone Caporale与庙前集团总经理廖建鸣即将现身井酒吧，带来仅此一夜的限定体验！
